entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
